CustomField.description: Displays the Payment Terms if "Hide T&C's" is not checked on the Conga Quote document and any Quote Line Items include an agreement.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Display_T_C_Dispenser_Agreement__c = "Y", Display_T_C_Equipment_Maintenance__c = "Y", Display_T_C_Equipment_Rental_Ware_Wash__c = "Y", Display_T_C_Equipment_Rental_Washroom_A__c = "Y", Display_T_C_Hygiene_Services__c = "Y", Display_T_C_Pest_Control_Service__c = "Y" ), "Y", "N" )
CustomField.label: Display T&C Payment
